= Pages

IMPORTANT: The root element of every page must always be `<ion-page>`.

[,vue,title="~/pages/page.vue"]
----
<template>
  <ion-page>
    <ion-header>
      <ion-toolbar>
        <ion-title>Title</ion-title>
      </ion-toolbar>
    </ion-header>
    <ion-content class="ion-padding">Content</ion-content>
  </ion-page>
</template>
----
